title: DerJeanLuc
author: DerJeanLuc
content: WoC is a new masternode coin that aims to advance the integration of cryptospace into the real world.This is not about quick profits through absurdly high ROI or a use case for any small defined groups (which then never come into contact with the coin anyway)! It's not about speculative investments and then (maybe) buying back your own coins!The value of WoC will arise solely from the benefit, because circulation and low new distributions (between 30% to 50% ROI per year - possibly significantly less) will also create demand. Services are gradually being developed and provided which have a real benefit, an example would be shops for very different things (clothing, electrical items, food and drink...). We have many different ideas which we will only publish gradually. Before we announce a new service, it should first be tested. We don't want to make a long list of promises that we might not be able to keep in the end, be it for technical or other reasons.All of the services we provide will be NonCustodial, no need to hand over coins at any point (except to pay for something of course - but that should be obvious). In order to increase security, there are already considerations to secure the payment processes at blockchain level to make it significantly more difficult for fraudulent traders! An integration of other coins at a later date cannot be ruled out, in which case the security functions at the blockchain level will of course not be available.With WoC you build the bridge between the digital and the analogue world - Buy real, tangible things with your WoC !CoindetailsPremine: 500,000 PoW Blocks: 1 - 1000PoS Blocks: Starting from 1001Block Time: 60 SecondsTotal Supply: comments.author: Lafu
comments.body: Please watch out when you downloading the Wallet , This user's password was reset recently and this user recently woke up from a long period of inactivity.The Account was last time active on May 18, 2018 and there is a big chance that this Account got hacked or changed hands.The Webpage on his post is also not secured , and the Github repositories was just created 7 hours ago.It smells all a bit suspicious here after that long break the first post is something with a download file.

comments.author: DerJeanLuc
comments.body: Yes i have been inactive quite a long time in this forum, but was active on discord. After all this time i forgot my password and had to reset it.The Webpage was secured with self signed with ssl certificate, this has been changed. Explorer page will get new certificate soon.I'm always open to constructive criticism and will soon be sharing more information about the project.

comments.body: Quote from: Lafu on April 19, 2023, 01:09:48 AMPlease watch out when you downloading the Wallet , This user's password was reset recently and this user recently woke up from a long period of inactivity.The Account was last time active on May 18, 2018 and there is a big chance that this Account got hacked or changed hands.The Webpage on his post is also not secured , and the Github repositories was just created 7 hours ago.It smells all a bit suspicious here after that long break the first post is something with a download file.Thank you for the heads up.

comments.body: Quote from: Lafu on April 19, 2023, 01:09:48 AMPlease watch out when you downloading the Wallet , This user's password was reset recently and this user recently woke up from a long period of inactivity.The Account was last time active on May 18, 2018 and there is a big chance that this Account got hacked or changed hands.The Webpage on his post is also not secured , and the Github repositories was just created 7 hours ago.It smells all a bit suspicious here after that long break the first post is something with a download file.Thank you for the heads up. It's always important to be cautious when downloading files from unknown sources, especially when there are red flags such as an inactive account that has recently been reset and a non-secure webpage.
